titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Clinton E. Norton Papers, 1997

profiledesc.creation: 1997Encoded in XMetal 2 by Amy Ziegler according to instructions in TARO 2 EAD 2002 Editing Instructions.

did.head: Descriptive Summary

extref.corpname: Dolph Briscoe Center for American History,The University of Texas at Austin

did.abstract: An autobiography titled Some Recollections documents Clinton E. Norton's personal and professional history as a Director of the University of Texas Performing Arts Center.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Clinton E. Norton is a former Director of the University of Texas Performing Arts Center and Executive Director of the International Society for the Performing Arts, from which he retired in 1991. He also served on the Board of Directors of the Society for the Preservation of Professional Touring Entertainment History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Papers include an autobiography of Norton's personal and professional history, titled Some Recollections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Clinton E. Norton Papers, 1997, The Dolph Briscoe Center for American History, The University of Texas at Austin.

controlaccess.subject: University of Texas Performing Arts Center

relatedmaterial.p: Forms part of the Professional Touring Entertainment Industry Archives.
